item.title: Computer Engineering (BEng), National University of Singapore
item.description: 2nd Major in Innovation & Design Top Student for CG1111A: Engineering Principles & Practice 1 (EPP1), AY21/22 Semester 1

item.title: Software Engineer, TOFFS Technologies
item.description: I was the main developer creating new backend software to integrate a Machine Learning Application into existing infrastructure to provide protection against DDOS & CC Attacks for our clients. Testimonial about my time at TOFFS kindly done by Co-Founder Jason Kong. Created a backend service to provide 24/7 real-time response to protect our customers’ domains Automated collection & management of large amounts of data (2.5+ TB) covering upwards of 20k domains Developed pipelines to manage and schedule training for hundreds of ML models, each tailored to a customer’s domain behaviour Improved scalability & efficiency of the ML training with code optimisations and use of distributed computing APIs.
